name: The Lone Sword
description:
The Lonely Sword is a Third-Person online PVP game, where the player plays the role of an undefeated lonely swordsman. Starting the game you will enter a painterly space. There you await challengers to join (if there's a room then you will join other people's space). Be sure to call some friends to play together online in case there are no matching players!

Controls:

AWSD to move around

left click to attack

right click to parry

shift to roll forward

z to dodge

space to jump
